title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the VMGuard project, including the types of virtual machines and cloud environments to be supported, backup strategies (full, incremental, differential), backup scheduling options, data retention policies, restore capabilities, security considerations (encryption, access controls), user interface needs (web-based, CLI, mobile app), and integration with existing infrastructure.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the VMGuard system, including the components, data flows, integration points with cloud providers and virtual machine management systems, as well as considerations for scalability, fault tolerance, security, and performance.

title: Develop Backup and Recovery Mechanisms
description: Implement the core functionality for backing up and restoring virtual machines, including scheduling, compression, deduplication, and encryption.

title: Implement Cloud Integration
description: Develop the necessary components and APIs to integrate with various cloud providers and virtual machine management systems.

title: Design and Develop User Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for configuring and managing backups, monitoring backup status, and initiating restores.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the security of the VMGuard system by implementing access controls, data encryption, and other security best practices.

title: Set up Testing and Continuous Integration
description: Establish a testing framework and continuous integration pipeline for automated testing and deployment of the VMGuard system.

title: Develop Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the VMGuard system, including installation, configuration, and usage instructions.

title: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform thorough testing of the VMGuard system, including functional, integration, performance, and security testing, to ensure it meets the defined requirements and quality standards.

title: Deploy and Monitor VMGuard System
description: Deploy the VMGuard system in production environments, monitor its performance and usage, and provide ongoing maintenance and support.
dependencies: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
